text: xo brrda phu sraththa xey phwk cea xya tidtam thang dein khxng chay txn læa phu dı tidtam thang dein khxng chay txn thæcring man ca chı hı thakar lamk læa khwam chaw læa hak michı khwam pordpran khx ngxallxhˌ kæ phwk cea læa khwam metta khxng phraxngkh læw k ca mimi phu dı ley nı hmu phwk cea brisuththi tæ xallxhˌ thrng hı phu thi phraxngkh thrng prasngkh brisuththi læa xallxhˌ pen phuthrng diyin phuthrng rxbru
